name: PaperVoxel.js
body:
# PaperVoxel.js
 An amazing 3d world generated to a map, the Town of DawnGuard. The texturing was done manually with coding, as was the fluid movements in camera view.

### Controls: 
WASD for movement, 
Left mouse to use item, 
right mouse to look around, 
N for Toggles.

## updates: 
4/14- published full code
4/18- added world editor in original code, infinity mapping

# soon to come:
nether
aether
creatures
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
